title: Woodham and Moortimer
body:
## The Task

J.D. Classics has been in business for 30 years and wanted to re-brand to give a more sophisticated and professional image.  They also wanted an advertising campaign to launch the brand as Woodham Mortimer.

## The Solution

We re-named the brand after a village in the local area, so the name had relevance.  We then created a simple but smart logo combined with a descriptor of their services.  The advertising campaign promoted their offering with highly sophisticated photography to give real stand out.

## The Results

The look and feel of the logo and advertising has transformed the brand which is now seen as one of the most professional and sophisticated in the sector
